backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining storage, authorization mixins, and many domain types such as School, Payment, Packing, TrainingVisit, and staff roles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short functional descriptions for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variants, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Initializes QueryClient and router, wraps the app in theming, query, and global error boundary providers.
frontend/src/components/demo/DemoDataUna: Alert component showing a demo‑mode message when data is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/demo/DemoPreview: Demo‑mode banner enabling role switching and showing data‑reset warnings with navigation and query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/error/GlobalErro: React error boundary that catches app-wide errors and displays a detailed fallback UI with optional technical info.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout handling authentication/demo redirects, user profile loading, role-based navigation, and logout.
frontend/src/components/layout/RoleNav.t: Role-based navigation menu that updates links and highlights the active route, supporting mobile mode.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Notifications dropdown showing unread items, allowing marking as read, with a simplified demo-mode view.
frontend/src/components/schools/SchoolSe: School search and listing panel with filtering and role-specific action links, showing loading and empty states.
frontend/src/demo/demoDataStore.ts: LocalStorage-backed demo data store for schools and related entities, with conversion helpers and corruption recovery.
frontend/src/demo/demoGuards.ts: Utility guards controlling which actions are allowed in demo mode and providing error messages for blocked mutations.
frontend/src/demo/demoProfile.ts: Generates synthetic UserProfile objects for each StaffRole for demo mode without backend calls.
frontend/src/demo/demoRoutes.ts: Maps each StaffRole to its dashboard route and provides a helper to fetch the route.
frontend/src/demo/demoSession.ts: Manages demo-mode session state in localStorage with credential validation and change events.
frontend/src/demo/useDemoPreview.ts: React hook exposing demo-mode state with reactive updates and helpers to set or clear demo sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and tracks the backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user, staff, and module operations with demo-mode fallbacks and actor integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes plus global button overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/academic/AcademicQuer: Displays all academic queries and allows responding with status updates, showing related school and packing info for selected items. Includes a dialog for submitting responses with mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/accounts/SchoolPaymen: Shows school details, packing status, and academic queries for a selected school, with loading states and navigation controls. Provides read‑only views of packing and school metadata.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSchoolDeta: Loads and displays consolidated school details including metadata, packing, training, and academic info, with special handling for demo mode. Includes section‑level update timestamps and navigation UI.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AuditLogPage.ts: Lists all audit logs with search and filtering by entity type, showing timestamps and log details. Handles loading, demo‑mode restrictions, and empty or filtered results.
frontend/src/pages/admin/OutstandingAmou: Provides UI to search schools, view current outstanding amounts, and update a selected school’s outstanding value.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StaffManagement: Displays staff list and supports creating, editing, and repairing staff profiles through dialogs and form submissions.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AcademicDa: Shows counts of open and resolved academic queries with quick navigation to the full queries list.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AccountsDa: Displays total schools and includes a school search panel for managing financial records.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Aggregates system-wide metrics like schools, outstanding amounts, packing status, and query counts for an admin overview.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/MarketingD: Shows marketing-related metrics and a selectable school list with outstanding amounts and packing summaries.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PackingDas: Provides packing operations overview with total schools and quick navigation to school search for packing tasks.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/TrainingDa: Displays training dashboard with summary cards and a schools overview table using multiple query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/IndexGatePage.tsx: Gate page that routes users or demo sessions to the correct dashboard after identity/profile checks.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements login via Internet Identity or demo credentials, handling session state, errors, and role-based navigation. Also supports copying principal IDs and auto-redirecting active demo sessions.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/SchoolCreat: Provides a form to create a new school and submit details via mutation, with navigation based on user role.
frontend/src/pages/packing/packingOption: Exports constant lists of packing classes and themes for selection components.
frontend/src/pages/packing/PackingSchool: Lists schools with search and selection to navigate to individual packing pages.
frontend/src/pages/packing/SchoolPacking: Allows viewing and updating packing status and theme-based packing counts for a specific school.
frontend/src/pages/schools/SchoolDetails: Shows school details with editable form for admins and saves updates via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/training/SchoolTraini: Manages school training visits and academic queries, including listing, creating, and editing visits with dialog forms. Fetches related school data such as outstanding amounts and packing status.
frontend/src/pages/training/TrainingQuer: Displays a list of academic queries with status badges and optional responses, showing skeleton loaders while fetching.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's route structure using TanStack Router, including authentication handling, dashboards, and feature-specific pages.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Provides a safe utility for extracting user-friendly error messages, handling BigInt issues and common React runtime errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, including a regression causing runtime errors and required fixes, with enumerated features and known issues. Acts as a planning artifact for restoring a working build and addressing hook misuse and redirect loops.
